jigsaw
Class PuzzlePiece

java.lang.Object
  jigsaw.PuzzlePiece

public class PuzzlePiece
extends java.lang.Object

This class describes a single piece of the puzzle. It holds four private long instance variables to describe the four sides of the puzzle piece.

Author:
Wei Dai,Song Gao
